entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 8:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
